net.parallaxed.bluejam.playback
Interface Listener

All Known Implementing Classes:
Configure, EvolutionTest, ListenerTest
public interface Listener

This interface can be implemented by classes that wish to receive notifications from evolving populations.

Author:
Ciarán Rowe (csr2@kent.ac.uk)
See Also:
Evolve

Method Summary
 void listen(NoteSequence n)
          Called by the Evolving population when a candidate NoteSequence is ready to be played.
 

Method Detail

listen

void listen(NoteSequence n)
Called by the Evolving population when a candidate NoteSequence is ready to be played. A null noteSequence should be passed when no more generations will be calculated.

Parameters:
n - The NoteSequence to be played.
